edu.mines.jtk.mesh

Class TriMesh.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.mesh.TriMesh.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    TriMesh

    public static class TriMesh.Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A node, which may be added or removed from the mesh.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • index

        public int index
        An integer index associated with this node. Intended for external use only; the mesh does not use it.

      • data

        public java.lang.Object data
        A data object associated with this node. Intended for external use only; the mesh does not use it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriMesh.Node

        public TriMesh.Node(float x,
            float y)
        Constructs a node with the specified coordinates. (Does not add the node to the mesh.)
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate.
        y - the y coordinate.
